text:
Imagination, huh?
What does Meguru think about?

Yeah, well...
First, "are we new students or transfer students"!

Whether we all took the same school entrance exam... or not,
or Illuminetransferred to a performing arts school, but that would be fun!

Oh! But Illumine does have entrance exams too, you know!?
That's a given!

I still want to do a lot of things!
Like studying together, having lunch together, joining clubs.

Ah, but I wonder if we'll change classes?
Because different teachers mean different subjects!
It would be nice if the three of us were in the same class!

Hahaha, yeah.
It's so much fun!
